resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
tianchen92 commented on pull request #5645: ARROW-6871: [Java] Enhance TransferPair related parameters check and tests
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5645
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6871](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6871).
   
   TransferPair related param checks in different classes have potential problems:
   
   i. copyValueSafe do not check from index, if from > valueCount, no error is shown.
   ii. splitAndTansfer has no indices check in classes like VarcharVector
   iii. splitAndTranser indices check in classes like UnionVector is not correct (Preconditions.checkArgument(startIndex + length <= valueCount)), should check params separately.
   iv. some assert usages should be replaced with Preconditions.
   v. should add more UT to cover corner cases.
   
   Also add a benchmark for copyValueSafe benchmark to avoid major performance regression, results show param checks has little effect on performance.
   
   Before this PR:
   Benchmark                                             Mode  Cnt   Score   Error  Units
   TransferPairBenchmarks.copyValueSafeForIntVector      avgt    5  18.811 ± 0.669  us/op
   TransferPairBenchmarks.copyValueSafeForVarcharVector  avgt    5  41.352 ± 1.786  us/op
   
   After this PR:
   Benchmark                                             Mode  Cnt   Score   Error  Units
   TransferPairBenchmarks.copyValueSafeForIntVector      avgt    5  18.626 ± 1.688  us/op
   TransferPairBenchmarks.copyValueSafeForVarcharVector  avgt    5  41.631 ± 2.943  us/op
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

liyafan82 commented on pull request #5645: ARROW-6871: [Java] Enhance TransferPair related parameters check and tests
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5645#discussion_r347703302
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/vector/src/main/codegen/templates/UnionVector.java
 ##########
 @@ -401,6 +401,8 @@ public TransferPair makeTransferPair(ValueVector target) {
   @Override
   public void copyFrom(int inIndex, int outIndex, ValueVector from) {
     Preconditions.checkArgument(this.getMinorType() == from.getMinorType());
+    Preconditions.checkArgument(inIndex >= 0 && inIndex < from.getValueCount(),
+        "Invalid inIndex: %s", inIndex);
 
 Review comment:
   I am not sure if it is a good idea to add check here. As this method can be performance critical, we decided to add minimum checks here, to compare minor types. 
   Please see the discussion here: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5019

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
{{TransferPair}} related param checks in different classes have potential problems:

i. {{copyValueSafe}} do not check from index, if from > valueCount, no error is shown.

ii. {{splitAndTansfer}} has no indices check in classes like {{VarcharVector}}

iii. {{splitAndTranser}} indices check in classes like UnionVector is not correct (Preconditions.checkArgument(startIndex + length <= valueCount)), should check params separately.

iv. some assert usages should be replaced with {{Preconditions}}.

v. should add more UT to cover corner cases.
fields.summary: [Java] Enhance TransferPair related parameters check and tests

comments.body:
+1 for adding more UT to test corner cases.

Please note that some of the operations are performance critical, so please pay attention to the performance impacts.
Thanks for your reminder, I will also add a benchmark, if there's no much regression, params check is needed/corrected to avoid potential problems.
